name: The Cellar
description: In this game, the stringer searches for information on the case of the mysterious disappearance of five children in 1997. An investigation leads him to an abandoned primary school, from which all five disappeared. He finds data about a certain cellar, which some children called "the cellar of Mr Bear".
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GEFORCE GTX 960 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GEFORCE GTX 1060 Storage: 3 GB available space
